name: The Void Club - ch.2 - 2.0 - early access

description:
This is the early access version, public version will be available the 15 of Mai

WARNING: MATURE CONTENT. This game contains mature themes, strong language, and strong sexual content. Viewer discretion is advised.

Chapter 2 Remake!, Less Oriana but more of everything else!
